Tilt Five NDK
Release History

1.2.0-beta

  • Moved info (T5_ClientInfo*) parameter from t5CreateGlasses() to t5CreateContext() and renamed to clientInfo
  • Added t5InitGlassesGraphicsContext() function to explicitly initialize the graphics functionality.
  • Removed info (T5_ConnInfo*) parameter from t5ReserveGlasses()
  • Added displayName (const char*) parameter to t5ReserveGlasses()
  • Removed T5_ConnInfo struct
  • Added t5SetGlassesDisplayName() to allow changing of the glasses displayName after t5ReserveGlasses()
  • Added T5_PERMISSION_DENIED/kPermissionDenied error codes
  • Added wand (T5_WandHandle) to t5GetGlassesIntegerParam(), t5GetGlassesFloatParam() and t5GetGlassesUtf8Param() [Use '0' to preserve previous behavior]
  • System and Glasses parameters of 'Floating' type have been renamed to 'Float'

1.1.0-beta

Initial beta release

  • Generated by 1.9.3
